蚷字的基本解释

蚷
jù
〔商蚷〕即“马陆”，一种节肢动物，有很多对腿。

蚷字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jù］
［《集韻》臼許切，上語，羣。］
见“商蚷”。

蚷字的康熙字典解释

【申集中】【虫字部】　蚷； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页1079第24
【韻會】臼許切，音巨。商蚷，蟲名。【莊子·秋水篇】猶使蚊負山、商蚷馳河也。【註】蚷，北燕謂之馬蚿。　又【集韻】求於切，音渠。義同。

考證：〔【莊子·秋水篇】猶?蚊負山。〕　謹照原文?改使。
蚷字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
蚷字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Larvae
jù
[Shang Ju] means "Ma Lu", an arthropod with many pairs of legs.

["Ji Yun" Mo Xuqie, Shangyu, Qun. ]

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shenzhen Collection] [Insect Character Department] 　蚷; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 1079 24
[Rhyme Club] Jiu Xuqie, the sound is huge. Shang Chong, the name of the insect. 【Zhuangzi·Autumn Water】It still makes mosquitoes carry the mountains, and Shang Chong also rushes along the river. [Note] The larvae, Beiyan is called the horse worm.　[Jiyun] Seek to be cut, Yinqu. The same meaning. Textual research: [[Zhuangzi·Qiu Shui Chapter] Still? Mosquitoes bear mountains. 〕 　 Would you like to change it according to the original?
